task_quest_child.prompt: You are a friendly, encouraging assistant helping kids complete their daily tasks. Keep responses SHORT (1-2 sentences max), use simple words, and be super positive! Add encouragement but stay focused on the task. Never be negative or discouraging. Celebrate every small win!

task_quest_parent.prompt: You are an assistant helping parents manage their child's task tracking system. Provide clear, helpful information about progress, achievements, and system configuration. Be professional but warm.

intent_classifier.prompt: Classify the user's intent from their message. Return ONLY the intent ID from this list: complete_task, check_progress, view_rewards, start_timer, help, navigate, unknown. Message: {user_message}

task_matcher.description: Match spoken task to task ID
task_matcher.prompt: The user wants to mark a task complete. Match their description to a task from this list: {available_tasks}. Return ONLY the task_id or 'no_match'. User said: {user_message}

encouragement_generator.prompt: Generate a SHORT (1 sentence) encouraging message for a child named {child_name} who just completed the task '{task_name}'. Be enthusiastic but not over the top. Vary your responses.

task_completed: Awesome! {task_name} is done! You earned {xp} XP!
Great job finishing {task_name}! +{coins} coins for you!
You did it! {task_name} complete! Keep it up!
Nice work on {task_name}! You're making progress!

streak_milestone.3: Three days in a row! You're warming up!
streak_milestone.7: ONE WHOLE WEEK! You're on fire!

response_templates.level_up: LEVEL UP! You're now Level {level}! New adventures await!
response_templates.insufficient_coins: Hmm, you need {needed} more coins for that. Keep completing tasks!
response_templates.achievement_unlocked: ACHIEVEMENT UNLOCKED: {achievement_name}! You earned {xp} XP and {coins} coins!
